meanings.definition: Pieces of fabric that have been cut in advance
meanings.sent1: I bought some precuts to make a quilt.
meanings.sent2: The store sells precuts for crafting projects.
meanings.sent3: The precuts were so neatly arranged, they looked like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of precuts was a rainbow waiting to be sewn together.
meanings.sent5: The precuts made it easy to start sewing without measuring and cutting.

meanings.sent1: She precuts the vegetables before starting to cook.
meanings.sent2: I precut the paper for the art class.
meanings.sent3: He precuts the cake slices to ensure equal portions for everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chef precuts the ingredients to save time during the rush hour.
meanings.sent5: Precutting the fabric allows for smoother sewing later on.
